channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Light not working at the back of 16 Nuthatch Gardens, 27th October
item.description:
Has been not working for a months time
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wren Path, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor Bin Management, 27th October
item.description:
Wheelie bins overflowing onto the pavement since before the last bin collection. Food waste and wrappers strewn into the pavement and street. Suspected HMO with too much rubbish - poor rubbish management and no correct use of recycling bins so collectors refusing to take it. Concerns about attracting rodents to the street and looks/smells terrible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramblebury Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Union Jack Flag and St George Flag, 27th October
item.description:
On the Council Street light across the road from my house someone has put up another Union Jack Flag overnight with a British Bull Dog on the flag also a St George Flag which has been up for a couple of weeks. I don't think its right that these flags should be allowed to stay up as I see them as racist and I feel intimidated and anxious by them. I hope the Council has plans to remove them not just on my Street but those throughout Erith & Crayford.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayfield Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle since August 2025!!!!, 27th October
